Class AnimationPanel.AnimationActionListener

java.lang.Object
AnimationPanel.AnimationActionListener
All Implemented Interfaces:

Enclosing class:

public class AnimationPanel.AnimationActionListener extends Object implements ActionListener
Inner class of ActionListener to control moving position update

  • Constructor Details

    • AnimationActionListener

      public AnimationActionListener​(ArrayList<Point> fromList, ArrayList<Point> toList, List<Component> components, int totalStep)
      Create a AnimationActionListener with necessary information of moving an image step by step
      Parameters:
      fromList - list of initial Positions
      toList - list of final Positions
      components - list of Components to be visible after moving
      totalStep - total amount of steps from one point to another
